name: MichiganNewsfromMLive
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Enable Michigan News from MLive to hear highlights of today's top headlines. Once enabled, go to your Alexa app, then Settings, then Flash Briefing. There you can edit the order of your Flash Briefings using the link at the upper right. We'll share headlines to start your afternoon drive Monday through Friday. Give us your Flash Briefing feedback by emailing contact@mlive.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
